description: This app is for all situations where you can't use a real vuvuzela. This app supports different horn sounds.  A vuvuzela, sometimes called a stadium horn, commonly blown by fans at football matches in South Africa.  :.:.:.:RELEASE NOTES:.:.:.: - v1.2.0 (2010-07-04)      * random sounds checkbox     * continuous sound function  - v1.1.0 (2010-06-20)      * clean up code     * stop function to pause the sound     * shake function to play random sounds  - v1.0.0 (2010-06-12) initial release
